summary: Internal FBI email chain regarding a pending FOIA request (#1424728) concerning Jeffrey Epstein. The correspondence involves FBI personnel from the Record/Information Dissemination Section (RIDS) and a field office, discussing the status of investigation file 31E-MM-108062 and seeking guidance on whether to release additional serials (251-257) from the file. The email mentions the arrest of Epstein that morning.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.role: Subject of FOIA request and investigation
persons.context: The FOIA request and the referenced FBI investigation file (31E-MM-108062) are about him. The email mentions his arrest on the morning of January 25, 2019.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Mentioned in passing in an FBI email as having occurred "this morning."

keyFacts: The FBI was processing FOIA request #1424728 concerning Jeffrey Epstein on January 24-25, 2019.
The responsive FBI investigation file is numbered 31E-MM-108062, with serials 1-250 already released from a prior civil action (17-CV-03956).
FBI personnel were seeking guidance on whether to process and release serials 251-257 from the same investigation file.
The email confirms Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on the morning of January 25, 2019, which aligns with his public arrest date.
